description: This file defines the interface for Bluetooth control via JSON-RPC in the WPEFramework. It includes class declarations, method registrations, event notifications, and external references related to Bluetooth operations such as scanning, connecting, pairing, and device management.

classes.name: JSONRPCImplementation
classes.description: A sample implementation class for Bluetooth control operations, providing methods to set discoverability, start/stop scanning, connect, disconnect, pair, unpair, and handle device info.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers Bluetooth control methods, properties, and events with the JSONRPC module.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters Bluetooth control methods, properties, and events from the JSONRPC module.
